name: Arrow Hit (itch)
description:
ARROW HIT

Journey into the world of intense action with this arcade game . Crush candies to buy more powerful arrows. Get faster arrows by crushing lots of candies. 
Defeat boss levels to gain entry into more difficult and interested levels.

                GAME FEATURES

EASY GAMEPLAY : Arrow hit operates on a tap and shoot gameplay which makes it easier to control.

100+ FUN LEVELS TO PLAY : There are more than hundred levels to play with multiple event's.

BOSS LEVELS : 8 boss levels are required to progress to higher levels.

DAILY REWARDS : Get daily candy rewards as you play.

ARROW SHOP : Use candies to purchase faster arrows. Choose random selection at a lower cost and hope for the fastest arrow.

AWESOME GRAPHICS
